item.title: Celery
item.description: What is celery?: Celery is a task queue. It allows us to run tasks asynchronously from Python web applications outside the HTTP request-response cycle. That means if there is a task that will take some time to complete and you donâ€™t want to wait until the completion of the task to respond to the client then we can run such tasks asynchronously by running in the background using celery. Components: Producer: For example, the Django application can be a producer.
